channel.title: Rune Topia Reborn
channel.description:
Back out from the underground of development, I decided that I would like to show you my server development again. This time I am not going to worry about having to update my thread every day. I am going to update when I get some real work done.
[u]Start Date, April 19.[/u] [u]base:[/u] ZDR, yes I know your going to say ever thing is done for you, but there is a lot of work to fix the skills and reduce lag still.
[u]Updates List:[/u] [u]April 19.[/u]
[ul][li]Removed Thread Per Client.[/li] [li]Removed many unneeded classes, savechar and loadchar backups, G cleaner, Savegame Handler, ServerConsole, Item 3 and 4.[/li][/ul]
[u]April 20.[/u]
[ul][li]Nothing done, to much home work.[/li][/ul]
[u]April 21.[/u]
[ul][li]Deleted all saving and loading, except for the SL from the IOClient and PlayerHandler.[/li] [li]Cleaned out CustomC packet, also handled it.[/li] [li]Deleted other dead code not needed, Client class is now 748kb was 814kb[/li] [li]Fixed Thread Per Client - nullerpointer and Java.lang.array error[/li][/ul]
[u]April 22.[/u]
[ul][li]Nothing new. :([/li][/ul]
[u]April 24.[/u]
[ul][li]Removed more junk, CC is not 669kb's :).[/li] [li]Player defending, it shows the animation when you get hi. :D[/li][/ul]
[u]Pictures:[/u]
Most of the files, I know its not packaged yet. :P [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24ehe.png[/img]
Out side folder setup, I have src, but bin won't be there until I package. :P [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/n1e70n.png[/img]
Shows TPC removed, logged in, I am using Khilomors client, I have a bunch of more work to do so be ready. :) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/qq3dhj.png[/img]
I hope you like the update list so far I will try to keep it as updated as possible.

item.title: Rune Topia Reborn
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

jmood128:

If your going to use a WL based server, I suggest you removed Thread Per Client, add Blakes crash patch and RSBuffer. With those your server will be even harder to crash since the Crash and RSBuffer patches will make it so that your Stream and Cryption classes are much less able to throw hurtful exceptions, also making your server 100% legit from Jagex copyright. While Grahams TPC fix will stop the SYI, Nullers, and Muti loggers, It also helps by adding all your players on a different thread meaning it should be more stable.

wow lol i already had done all that… it turned out pretty nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Topia Reborn
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If your going to use a WL based server, I suggest you removed Thread Per Client, add Blakes crash patch and RSBuffer. With those your server will be even harder to crash since the Crash and RSBuffer patches will make it so that your Stream and Cryption classes are much less able to throw hurtful exceptions, also making your server 100% legit from Jagex copyright. While Grahams TPC fix will stop the SYI, Nullers, and Muti loggers, It also helps by adding all your players on a different thread meaning it should be more stable.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Topia Reborn
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:1, topic:336580”]New networking:

[ul][li](Any suggests to what I should use?)[/li][/ul][/quote]
i was actually doing a whitescape source aswell, i just love wL’s simplicity.

in regards to networking, you could probably use Helion, which is a reactor pattern based upon NIO, also xsocket, and mina are descent options,

personally id recommend waiting if you choose to use mina, because ive heard some talk about a major rewrite from version 2-3, whereas xsocket has already had its rewrite semi recently.

Read full topic

@doom_j wrote:

Back out from the underground of development, I decided that I would like to show you my server development again. This time I am not going to worry about having to update my thread every day. I am going to update when I get some real work done.

Start Date, April 19.
base: ZDR, yes I know your going to say ever thing is done for you, but there is a lot of work to fix the skills and reduce lag still.

April 19.

[ul][li]Removed Thread Per Client.[/li]
[li]Removed many unneeded classes, savechar and loadchar backups, G cleaner, Savegame Handler, ServerConsole, Item 3 and 4.[/li][/ul]

April 21.

[ul][li]Deleted all saving and loading, except for the SL from the IOClient and PlayerHandler.[/li]

[li]Player defending, it shows the animation when you get hi. :D[/li][/ul]
